pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa pūgassa saṃghassa sacīvarabhattaṃ paṭiyattaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.4: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.9: “Bahū, āvuso, saṃghassa dāyakā, bahū saṃghassa bhattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.10: Ime tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.11: Tumhe ce imesaṃ na dassatha, atha ko carahi imesaṃ dassati?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.13: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṃ cīvaraṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ datvā saṃghaṃ bhattena parivisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.14: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṃghassa sacīvarabhattaṃ paṭiyattaṃ “na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dinnan”ti te evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.17: Yathāpaṭiyattaṃ cīvaraṃ ayyā chabbaggiyā ayyānaṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ pariṇāmesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.18: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.19: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.20: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.23: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.25: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:1.26: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.6: sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.1.12: “dassāma karissāmā”ti vācā bhinnā hoti, taṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.1: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.2: Pariṇate vematiko puggalassa pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.4: Saṃghassa pariṇataṃ aññasaṃghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.5: Cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññacetiyassa vā saṃghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.2.6: Puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññapuggalassa vā saṃghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc82:2.3.3: “yattha tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo paribhogaṃ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṃ vā labheyya ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṃ cittaṃ pasīdati tattha dethā”ti bhaṇati,
